channel.title: macworld on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in macworld on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Not dazzled by the turtleneck
item.description: Ewan Spence slices through the usual fan-boy nonsense and looks forward to the Jobs keynote at MacWorld. Let him know what you think. Whilst it’s nice to be able to flick photos with your index finger, I prefer a phone that has phone features like 3G, HSDPA, Bluetooth etc. And why does no-one ever comment on the Apple TV flop? Review of the best business phone ever made, the Nokia N95 8GB, coming soon.
